venues.description:
Apotektergaarden brews their own beer, makes amazing food and has the best backyard during the summer.
Apotektergaarden is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Apotektergaarden

venues.description:
BAR with their Social eating concept serves dished best eaten together. They have an exclusive club in the based during the night.
BAR Bygdøy Allé is a Rescue Juice venue and offer Rescue Juice for sale at the bar.
venues.name: BAR Bygdøy Allé

venues.description:
This place is legendary for it’s summer parties and lunches that turn into all nighters. BAR i located on the sunny side of Tjuvholmen and offer up great cocktails and food that is made for sharing. Bring friends!
BAR Tjuvholmen offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: BAR Tjuvholmen

venues.description:
BAR Vulkan with it’s amazing roof top bar during the summer and spacious lounge and dinner area is one of the more popular places in the area. Their social eating concept makes it a great place to hang out, party and eat with friends.
BAR Vulkan is a Rescue Juice™ venue, offering Rescue Juice.
Monday 8:00 am — 11:30 pm
Tuesday 8:00 am — 11:30 pm
Wednesday 8:00 am — 11:30 pm
Thursday 8:00 am — 11:30 pm
venues.name: BAR Vulkan

venues.description:
Både & er en klassisk pub hvor vi serverer skikkelig pubmat og solid norsk husmannskost. Er du på farten har vi egen take away meny. Vi har en rekke både spennende og tradisjonelle retter på menyen. Du skal spise like godt her som ellers på Bakgården!
Du kan nyte et bredt utvalg av drikke med alle rettigheter. Vi har et bredt utvalg av single malt whiskies og byens største aquavitsamling. Godt øl står naturlig nok i sentrum og ølsortimentet utvides stadig både på fat og flaske. Dette er stedet for den gode ølopplevelsen. 
Utvalgte fotballkamper vises på storskjerm. Eller hvorfor ikke samles en gjeng rundt dartskiva, raflekoppen eller noen av våre spill i vår gjestfrie atmosfære.    
Vi har åpent syv dager i uken hele året. Vi treffes på Både &.
venues.name: Bakgården Både Og

venues.description: BAR(T) is Hemsedals most popular club with 6 bars, top dj`s, delicious drinks and great bartenders. You find us at Fanitullen in the city center. Guestlist or groups please contact us on phone +47 46 54 09 68 or mail al716@peppes.no
venues.name: Bart(T) Hemsedal

venues.description:
Cafe Galleri is an institution in Grimstad, one of the go to places with it’s great roof top bar during the summer, and two story club inside. Cafe Galleri offers club nights, live music, stand up and quiz nights.
Cafe Galleri is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Cafe Galleri

venues.description:
Perfectly located in the city center Cafe Sør offers great food, coffee and a relaxed environment. Free wifi and the ability to sit down and do some work during the day. Cafe Sør turns into a club during the night with great DJ’s spinning the records late into the night.
Cafe Sør is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Cafe Sør

venues.description:
Located in in the beginning Frognerveien it surly has a prime location in Oslo west. Champagneria is a great place for tapas and bubbles, it’s extensive wine menu and great prices makes this one of the go to places for those who want to eat well and drink bubbles.
Champagneria is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Champagneria Frogner

venues.description: Located inside the Highland Lodge Hotel you'll find the best restaurant in Geilo. High quality Norwegian produce made into a wide array of tapas.
venues.name: Champagneria Highland Hotell

venues.description:
Champagneria Marina is locate down by the water front in Tønsberg. Authentic spanish tapas with a twist this venue sure is a favorite for small bites and bottles of bubbles.
Champagneria is a Never Ending Power Venue and offer free exchange of your Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Champagneria Tønsberg

venues.description:
Dattera til Hagen is one the go to places located on the east side of Oslo called Grønnland. Their popular back yard that serves up awesome DJ´s and concerts during the summer is a prime location for going out with friends or a large party. Dattera is know for a great Tapas and a good selection of beers and wine.
Dattera til Hagen is a Never Ending Power Venue and offer free exchange of your Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Dattera til Hagen

venues.description: Dark wood, great selection of whiskey.  2-story pub with bar menu, big screen live sports & weekend, late-night DJs and several pool tables. One of the best "secret" backyards in down town Oslo.
venues.name: Dr.Jekyll's

venues.description:
Døgnvill is the go to place for burgers and shakes in the Vulkan area. Their burgers are amazing not to mention their milkshakes (add a shot of burbon for that extra YOLO factor).
All Døgnvill food is home made and cared for before serving which makes this one of the best burger joints in Oslo. Døgnvill is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Døgnvill Stavanger

venues.description:
Døgnvill is the go to place for burgers and shakes in the Tjuvholmen area. Their burgers are amazing not to mention their milkshakes (add a shot of burbon for that extra YOLO factor). All Døgnvill food is home made and cared for before serving which makes this one of the best burger joints in Oslo.
Døgnvill is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Døgnvill Tjuvholmen

venues.description:
Døgnvill is the go to place for burgers and shakes in the Vulkan area. Their burgers are amazing not to mention their milkshakes (add a shot of burbon for that extra YOLO factor). All Døgnvill food is home made and cared for before serving which makes this one of the best burger joints in Oslo.
Døgnvill is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Døgnvill Vulkan

venues.description:
Follestad is the place to go if you like high quality mens wear. Follestad has hand picked and curated amazing pieces of menswear in their boutique.
Follestad offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Follestad Eger

venues.description:
Follestad is the place to go if you like high quality mens wear. Follestad has hand picked and curated amazing pieces of menswear in their boutique.
Follestad offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Follestad Jessheim

venues.description:
Follestad is the place to go if you like high quality mens wear. Follestad has hand picked and curated amazing pieces of menswear in their boutique.
Follestad offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Follestad Paleet

venues.description: Follestad is the place to go if you like high quality mens wear. Follestad has hand picked and curated amazing pieces of menswear in their boutique.Follestad offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Follestad Strømmen

venues.description:
Follestad is the place to go if you like high quality mens wear. Follestad has hand picked and curated amazing pieces of menswear in their boutique.
Follestad offer Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Follestad Valkyrien

venues.description: Perfectly located at Tønsberg Brygge you’ll find Foynhagen, a green oasis situated close to the popular waterfront. Built by a local celebrity called Svend Foyn a pioneer in the Norwegian fishing industry, now converted from house to the biggest event venue in Tønsberg city.
venues.name: Foynhagen Sense

venues.description: Definitely one of the best bars in town. From the cosiest experience over board games to the best live music over an amazing cocktails! Service, venue, staff all great experience.
venues.name: Hanekam

venues.description: Apartments with modern architecture and large windows. The Alpin Lodge is situated ski in/ski out right next to the children’s area. In the Lodge you will find almost everything you need; reception, grocery store, ski rental, ski shop, restaurant and bar. Walking distance to cross country trails, several restaurants, night life and sports bar with bowling and arcade games.
venues.name: Hemsedal Alpin Lodge

venues.description:
Vi er en rendyrket boardshop hvor betjeningen og teamkjørerne tester alt av snowboardutstyr før vi kjøper inn varer så vi vet hva som selges i vår butikk. Vi har derfor mer kompetanse og kunnskap om produktene enn en sportsbutikk, og dette er helt klart en fordel for deg som kunde når du trenger veiledning ved kjøp av nytt utstyr hos oss.

Ved kjøp av snowboardsko varmer vi opp skoene og spesialtilpasser de til akkurat din fot i butikken.

Vi har også demoer på snowboard hvor du som kunde kan få testkjøre våre snowboard helt gratis så du får et bedre perspektiv på hvilket brett som passer for dine kjøreegenskaper. I våres testsenter i Hemsedaskianlegg får du mulighet til nettopp dette slik at du kan være helt sikker på at du gjør et godt kjøp. Følg vår facebook side for oppdateringer og hvor å hvilke dager vi har demo/testsenter.
venues.name: Hemsedal Boardshop

venues.description: Hemsedal café was established 14th february 1989, and has over 25 years history. “the menu at hemsedal café is inspired by food from all over the world and offer something for every taste.
venues.name: Hemsedal Cafe

venues.description:
Horgan is famous for their day time American diner that serves one of Bogstadveiens best Burgers & Fries. During the night Horgans turns into a fully packed club with DJ and their own roofed backyard (for those who smoke)
Horgans is a Rescue Juice venue and offer Rescue Juice at the bar.
venues.name: Horgans

venues.description:
For et fullverdig utvalg av våre produkter, ønsker vi deg velkommen til vår BrandStore i Hemsedal Sentrum på Rampa Kjøpesenter. Alle våre produkter blir designet og utviklet i Hemsedal, inspirert av flott natur og fine folk.
Her finner du hekla HyggeLuer med morsom tekst i knæsje farger, originalt Made by Mamma. Vi har også Slakkline, Goggles, Ski & TurSokker, Boxere og Klær for dame og herre. Alle produkter i nettbutikken vår er tilgjengelig i butikken i Hemsedal Sentrum.
 
Vi har også kontorer i samme lokaler som Hyggesjappa i Sentrum. Kom gjerne innom for en kaffekopp og hyggelig prat dersom det ikke har dumpet ned med pudder. Da er vi nemlig å finne i bakken :)
venues.name: House of Hygge

venues.description:
House of Hygge is an awesome retailer with everything you need to stay safe, warm and cozy during your stay in Hemsedal.
House of Hygge is a Rescue Juice venue that sell pre-charged Rescue Juice
venues.name: House of Hygge Brand Store

venues.description:
John Dee live club is a rock institution in Oslo. Known for it’s rocked out style and new and breaking artist. Go to John Dee for an even more intimate rock experience.
John Dee is a Never Ending Power Venue and offer free exchange of your Rescue Juice.
venues.name: John Dee

venues.description:
Kulturhuset is located at Youngstorget and serves as a co-working space during the day and a speakers corner in the late afternoon. At night the venue turns into a club with shuffleboard, table tennis and great music.
Kulturhuset is a Rescue Juice venue, offering Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Kulturhuset

venues.description:
LAWO is one of the biggest clubs in Oslo. Their different sections makes this the go to bar for hooking up or just plain old partying.
Kulturhuset is a Rescue Juice venue, offering Rescue Juice.
venues.name: LAWO

venues.description:
Løkka skal være mye for mange, og skal tilby tv for de store sportsøyeblikkene i vårt barområde, som har bredt utvalg av øl, og stort utvalg av spill for vennegjengen.
Spill en runde monopol, scrable eller bezzerwizzer - eller knus dine venner på Løkkas flipperspill.
I barområdet er det Shuffleboard, hjemmelaget Løkkaburger, fish & chips, fersk poppa popcorn og barkeepere som kan servere deg knallbra Løkkadrikke.
Løkka Bistro serverer tapas fra Spania, dagsfersk og hjemmelaget pizza og pasta fra Italia.
venues.name: Løkka Traktering

venues.description:
The largest ski resort in the Oslo area, with 18 slopes and 11 lifts - just 30 minutes from the city centre. 

Oslo Winter Park (formerly Tryvann) includes a terrain park in the Hyttli area, cruising slopes in Tryvann, slopes for children and beginners, and challenging slopes and an express lift in Wyller.

Tryvann: Chair lift, two slopes (green/red, 400-900 metres)
Hyttli: Chair lift, five slopes (blue, 214-830 metres), terrain park, halfpipe, rails and jumps
Vestkleiva: T-bar lift, cross trail (blue, 500 metres), ski-cross/boarder-cross (jumps, bumps etc.)
Wyller: Six-seat express lift, four slopes (black, 1300-1550 metres), Olympic-size super pipe
Tommkleiva: Two bowl lifts, two slopes (green, 200 metres)
venues.name: Oslo Vinterpark

venues.description:
Paparazzi is perfectly located by the ocean front of Trønsberg city center they serve up great food and turn into a club during the night. The perfect place for a lunch or and all nighter in Tønsberg.
Paparazzi is a Rescue Juice venue.
venues.name: Paparazzi

venues.description:
Pinerolo Americano
Henrik Ibsens gate 60A, 0255 Oslo
Pinerolo Americano is the American counterpart of the Cantina. Wholesome American food refined to create a truly genuine American food experience. Located close to Solli plass this restaurant serves up the best burgers and fries in the area. The restaurant turns into a lounge and club during the night.
Pinerolo Americano is a Rescue Juice™ venue, offering Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Pinerolo Americano

venues.description:
Pinerolo Cantina is located at the heart of Oslos most busy shopping street Bogstadveien. Serving up what can only be said to be amazing Italian dished made to share. Pinerolo Cantina is one of the places to visit with friends to share great tasting food and wine. This places also become a club if you stay long enough.
Pinerolo Cantina is a Rescue Juice venue and offer Rescue Juice for sale at the bar.
venues.name: Pinerolo Cantina

venues.description:
Hos Puro hårstylister streber vi etter å gi kunden en unik opplevelse. Puro sine dyktige og erfarne stylister tilbyr det nyeste innen hårspa, klipp, extentions, farge og sminke. Puro Hårstylister tilbyr nå som en av få utvalgte et stort utvalg av mineral sminke fra GLO.
Hos oss finner du alt du trenger til håret. Vi samarbeider med KEUNE og Hempz hårprodukter som har ett bredt utvalg for alle hårtyper.
Plei deg selv eller overrask noen du er glad i med en gave som gleder. Vi tilbyr nå også håndspa som vil gi nytt liv til dine hender.
venues.name: Puro Stylistene

venues.description:
Rockfeller Music Hall is one of the oldest concert arenas in Oslo. Rockfeller is always jam packed every day of the week and never stops serving it’s customers the best artists on earth.
Rockefeller is a Never Ending Power Venue and offer free exchange of your Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Rockefeller

venues.description:
1,750-capacity venue for big-name international rock bands, plus club nights & film screenings.
Sentrum Scene is owned by the Rockefeller group, and is known to show international super stars on their small and intimate stage. Sentrum Scene is one of the best stages in Oslo if you want that special intimate concert experience.
venues.name: Sentrum Scene

venues.description:
Explore a mountain of opportunities by visiting our selection of restaurants and let your taste buds be your guide on a journey which explores both Norwegian roots and traditions, italian traditions, as well as diving into the definition of a proper burger joint.
A la carte // Traditional home cooked meals inspired by norwegian and local roots, leveraging the abundance of access to local suppliers and produce. All this served in a casual bistro atmosphere. The restaurant strives to create a sophisticated yet simple and casual feel, both in our dining room and bar.
Our restaurant is open from 09:00 where we offer healthy breakfast, snacks and supplies for a successful day out in winter wonderland. 
 
Pizzeria //
Regardless of which tradition, honoring roots and traditional craftsmanship implies quality. When it comes to food, we regard old craftsmanship as off immense value and strongly believe it is recognized in its taste. With a wood burning stove of the highest quality and pizza chefs who have mastered the art of Italian pizza baking everything is in place to ensure that you have a wonderful experience with us up in the mountains. We are proud to offer a delicious " italian style" pizza that will keep you coming back for more.
 
T-kroken Burger & Bar // "There is no love more sincere than the love of food" and this is something we take seriously. It is basically a concept that is all about "really good burgers " made from scratch using only the best local produce.
venues.name: Skigaarden Ski Shop

venues.description:
The Skistua building is located in the base area of Hemsedal Ski Center. At Skistua you'll find a restaurant serving lunch ala carte. When the lunch is over you will enjoy Hemsedals best après-ski and live band every weekend!
Ski holiday means enjoying life. Skistua provides the perfect stay for our quest with good food, beverage and apés-ski.
venues.name: Skistua Hemsedal

venues.description:
Stavkroa is the go to place for that true Norwegian after-ski experience.
Stavkroa is a Rescue Juice™ venue, offering Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Stavkroa

venues.description:
Stranda Skiresort is located east in the magnificent "Alps of Sunnmore", in the western part of Norway. 
7 lifts,17 downhill slopes in various difficulties, children`s park, terrain park and perhaps the best off-piste opportunities in Scandinavia, provides something for every member of the Family. 
Parts of the Resort have artificial lights for evening skiing, and a top modern snow making system ensures nice conditions throughout the season. 
Cross-Country enthusiasts can enjoy 15 km of groomed tracks, and "unlimited" expedition possibilities. - See more at: http://www.strandafjellet.no/resort-information/stranda-skiresort#sthash.QxfHfV8Y.dpuf
venues.name: Stranda Skisenter

venues.description:
Svean is the most on of the preferred fashion outlets for trend setters in Oslo. Their curated selection of old and new brands makes this the go to place for shopping what’s next in fashion.
Kulturhuset is a Rescue Juice venue, offering Rescue Juice.
venues.name: Svean Paleet

venues.description: Dark wood, great selection of beers and food.  4-story pub with bar menu, big screen live sports & weekend, late-night DJs.
venues.name: The Scotsman

venues.description:
Equipment for mountain sports
Shop clothes and equipment for the mountain holiday in skistarshop.com or in our Skistarshop Concept Stores when you are at the destination. Located in the Hemsedal Alpin Lodge
venues.name: Tiger Tiger

venues.description:
Perfectly located just inside Strøget close to Youngstorget, Uhørt offers up a simple and tasty lunch, coffee and a relaxed environment. Free wifi and the ability to sit down and do some work during the day this place is a great alternative to other pricy co-working spaces if you need a place to work during the day. Uhørt turns into a live music, standup and poetry club during the night.
Uhørt is a Never Ending Power™ venue, offering Rescue Juice and unlimited refills for any Rescue Juice user.
venues.name: Uhørt

venues.description: Located in the mountains of Valdres you find the Alpine Center, a great place to go skiing or snowobarding between November and April. You'll find free Never Ending Power in the bottom of the slope.
venues.name: Valdres Alpinsenter
